title: Direction
text: We can tell whether the parabola goes up or down based on the sign of a in the equation, $$y=a x^2+b x+c$$. If a is negative, then the parabola goes downwards, if it is positive, it goes upwards.

title: Direction
text: Since our a is negative, what does this tell us about our parabola?

title: Downwards Direction
text: Since our a is negative, we know that our parabola will open up downwards.

title: Finding the Vertex
text: To find the vertex, we need to find the axis is symmetry, which is found using the formula, $$x=\frac{-b}{2} a$$.

title: Finding the Axis of Symmetry
text: To find the axis of symmetry, we have to find the $$b$$ and a from our equation.

title: Finding the Axis of Symmetry
text: Our $$b$$ and a are $$2$$ and $$-1$$ respectively. Our axis of symmetry is $$x=-1\frac{-2}{2}$$.

title: Finding the Vertex
text: Now that we have our axis of symmetry, we want to plug it back into the original equation to find the $$y$$ value of our vertex.

title: Finding the Vertex
text: Since our $$x$$ is $$1$$, we plug it into our equation as, $$y=-\left(1^2\right)+2\times1-4$$. This gives us $$y=-3$$.

title: Vertex
text: Since we know that our $$x$$ is $$1$$ and our $$y$$ is $$-3$$, our vertex is at the coordinates, $$(1,-3)$$.

title: Finding Intercepts
text: To graph our parabola, we need to know our $$x$$ and $$y$$ intercepts.

title: Finding the y-intercepts
text: Our y-intercept occurs when $$x=0$$. Knowing this, we substitute $$0$$ into our equation.

title: Finding the y-intercepts
text: After plugging in $$x=0$$ to our equation, we see that a y-intercept occurs when $$y=-4$$, so our y-intercept is $$(0,-4)$$.

title: Finding the x-intercepts
text: Our $$x$$ intercepts occur when $$y=0$$. We plug in $$y=0$$ to our equation and solve for the x's.

title: Finding the x-intercepts
text: We must factor the GCF from our equation and factor the trinomial. After trying to do this, we find that there are no x-intercepts.

title: Graphing
text: Now that we have all of our properties, we are ready to graph our parabolas.
